text: @realDonaldTrump Oh gee-at first I thought u said you’d be leaving the White House today! What a happy announcement that would have been chump! What’s next? Telling people to eat fire to cure Covid19? Ur so dam stupid? Telling people to drink bleach? Come on! That’s beyond dumb!
